[ADD].title: ADD
[ADD].description: When the project welcome new files

[BLD].title: BUILD
[BLD].description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies

[BTF].title: BEAUTIFULLAGE
[BTF].description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

[C.I].title: CONTINUOUS INTEGRATION
[C.I].description: Changes to the CI configuration files and scripts

[HOC].title: HOUSE CLEANING
[HOC].description: Changes that make the repository more clean (wiping, cleaning, mopping)

[IGN].title: IGNORE
[IGN].description: When adding a .gitignore file or similar

[OTH].title: OTHER
[OTH].description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files

[PRF].title: PERFORMANCE
[PRF].description: A code change that improves performance

[RFA].title: REFACTOR
[RFA].description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

[STY].title: STYLE
[STY].description: Changes that mainly change the style, look and feel or visual appearance

[TST].title: TEST
[TST].description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

[TYP].title: TYPO
[TYP].description: An error (as of spelling) in typed or typeset material

[WIP].title: WORK IN PROGRESS
[WIP].description: Work in progress, e.g. in case of fire
